LightningComponentBundle.description: Lightning flow component that scans a barcode and returns the text for further processing.

property.name: scannedBarcode
property.label: Variable to store barcode text
property.description: Variable in which to store the scanned barcode text.

property.name: debug
property.label: Show debug panel after scan
property.description: Show the raw text of the scanned barcode in a panel after the scan is complete.

property.name: buttonLabel
property.label: Button label (optional)
property.description: The label on the button that initiates the barcode scan (defaults to 'Barcode Scanner').

property.name: successMessage
property.label: Flow/Apex success message
property.description: A message that will appear in a toast if the flow or Apex class is successfully run.
